name: Cyber Hacker
description:
"An intriguing game that seems to be a worthy successor to Uplink" - Aug 8, 2015 (Dutch App Store Review)

"Feels like a mobile Uplink... Worth every penny." - Aug 7, 2015 (USA App Store Review)

"Loving it so far. Heavily recommend if you like games like uplink" - Aug 8, 2015 (USA App Store Review)


Have you got the skills? Hack into the most carefully guarded virtual spaces!

You are a professional hacker who makes a living by breaking into computer systems all over the world. Discover passwords and trade secrets, create viruses, and watch chaos unfold from your secret lair. As your skill and experience level increases you will receive more challenging tasks. And beware of Interpol! It is you they will go after.

Cyber Hacker is a high strategy game involving such features as social engineering, computer viruses, and industrial espionage. Work against a ticking clock in a highly realistic digital world.

Game Features:

● Extensive Hacking Simulator (Social Engineering, Virus Lab, etc.)
● Virtual Targets from 20 different countries
● Immersive Music and Sounds
● Interactive Tutorial

Note: No actual hacking skills necessary to play the game.

Disclaimer: Cyber Hacker is a hacking simulator game; no real hacking involved.
